mapper.select: SELECT RS_IMG_PATH FROM RS_IMG WHERE rs_no = #{rsNo}
SELECT RS_FOOD_MENU, RS_FOOD_PRICE FROM RS_MENU WHERE rs_no = #{rsNo}

SELECT R.RS_REV_RATING AS RS_REV_RATING , R.REV_CONTENTS AS REV_CONTENTS, R.REV_CREATE_DATE AS REV_CREATE_DATE, R.REV_UPDATE_DATE AS REV_UPDATE_DATE, M.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICK AS MEM_NICK FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE R.rs_no = #{rsNo}
SELECT IFNULL(AVG(RS_REV_RATING),0) FROM REVIEW WHERE rs_no = #{rsNo}
